meanings.definition: The state of having a great deal of money or wealth.
meanings.sent1: Her affluences allowed her to travel the world and buy luxurious items.
meanings.sent2: The country's affluences were evident in the extravagant mansions and expensive cars.
meanings.sent3: Despite his affluences, he preferred a simple life without unnecessary extravagance.
meanings.sent4: In the land of affluences, even the smallest gestures of kindness were considered valuable.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering affluences of the city dazzled all who visited.

meanings.definition: A plentiful supply of material goods.
meanings.sent1: The store boasted an affluences of fresh fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The warehouse was filled with affluences of clothing and electronics.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket overflowed with affluences of delicious treats.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was an affluences of colorful flowers and fragrant herbs.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest held an affluences of sparkling jewels and gold coins.
